text.text: Wands can be created in a Tool Forge - a Tool Station lacks the precise instruments required for the process - but comes with some caveats.

Primarily, even the Tool Forge is a crude instrument for magic, and will leave a wand emptied entirely on creation.  Furthermore, additional tinkering will empty the wand until it has been infused with the mystical energies of a spell, which can only be done in an Arcane Workbench.
Finally, note that wands cannot be repaired like other tools - they must be recharged with mana from Magic crystals or flasks.
